argument.name: fileName
argument.description: The filename of an iPhone photo.

page.description: Extracts html and JSON formatted exif data from an iPhone photo.
page.discussion: a5_exif_getIphoneFormattedData extracts the EXIF information from a photo on iPhone. The returned object contains the following properties:

item.name: html
item.description: A character containing the EXIF information formatted as HTML.

item.name: results
item.description: A dot variable holding all EXIF properties that were found.

item.name: json
item.description: A JSON string containing the EXIF information, if found.

item.name: errorText
item.description: Contains the error message if hasError is .t.

section.title: Examples
section.example: dim formatted_exif as p formatted_exif = a5_exif_getIphoneFormattedData("c:\images\photo.jpg") if ((formatted_exif.hasError = .T.)) then 'An error occurred end if
